summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 25, 2019. It includes official count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms detailing the inmate population and their assignments. The records show Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate in the H-A unit (Housing Unit A, cell H01-001L) on that date.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative counts of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including morning and evening counts, and tracking of inmates out of their housing units for various assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 25, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein was housed in unit H-A, specifically cell H01-001L, as per the inmate roster for attorney visits.
The total inmate census recorded in the morning count was 771, and in the evening count was 770.
The documents are routine prison administrative records showing inmate assignments, counts, and movements, providing a snapshot of the facility's population on that date.
Multiple other inmates are listed with their registration numbers, housing units, and work/assignment details (e.g., Food Service, Hospital, Attorney visits).
